params.admin: The address to be assigned as the admin of the new token
params.currency: The currency identifier for the new token
params.name: The name for the new token
params.symbol: The symbol for the new token

returns._0: The address of the newly created token contract

getTokenAddress(address,bytes32).details: Reverts with AddressReserved if the computed address would be in the reserved range

params.salt: The salt to use for deterministic deployment
params.sender: The address that will call createToken

params.token: The address of the token to check

returns._0: True if the address is a TIP-20 token, false otherwise

createToken(string,string,string,address.notice: Creates a new TIP-20 compliant token

getTokenAddress(address,bytes32).notice: Predicts the address of a token deployment given sender and salt

isTIP20(address).notice: Checks if a given address is a TIP-20 compliant token
